articles.title: Argentina grains exchange holds 2022/23 soy, corn forecasts steady
articles.description: BUENOS AIRES, March 23 (Reuters) - Argentina's Buenos Aires grains exchange maintained its 2022/2023 production forecast forecasts for both soy and corn Thursday, following earlier cuts after both crops have been battered by a prolonged drought.The exchange held its soybean harvest estimate at 25 million tonnes and its corn harvest estimate at 36 million tonnes. (Reporting by

articles.title: Argentina exchange sees 2022/23 soy imports up 139% due to drought
articles.description: BUENOS AIRES, March 23 (Reuters) - Argentina's soybean imports are expected to more than double this season due to the devastating impacts of a historic drought on the country's 2022/23 harvest, the country's Rosario grains exchange said in a report on Thursday.Argentina is the world's leading exporter of soybean oil and meal, thanks to a powerful grain processing industry
